H3.text: who are nominated for president of india 2017. Meira Kumar

A4.text: After nomination for the post of 14th president of India, he resigned from his post as the governor of Bihar

A5.text: Meira Kumar, the presidential candidate of the Opposition who received 34.35%

A6.text: Governor of Bihar Ram Nath Kovind of the Bharatiya Janata Party had the backing of the governing National Democratic Alliance coalition, and went up against opposition candidate Meira Kumar of the Indian National Congress in the vote.

A7.text: President Pranab Mukherjee, whose term of office was due to expire on 24 July 2017, declined to seek re-election due to health concerns and old age.
